#include<stdio.h>


inline void inp( int &n )//fast input function
{
    n=0;
    int ch=getchar();int sign=1;
    while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getchar();}

    while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
     n = (n*10) + ch-'0', ch=getchar();
     n=n*sign;
}
int main()
{
int n;
long long sum=0;
while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
{int arr[n];
for(int t=0;t<n;t++)
{inp(arr[t]);
sum+=arr[t];
}
for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
{
	printf("%d ",arr[i]);
}
printf("\n");
printf("%lld\n",sum);

sum=0;}
return 0;

}
